{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = 802.11ac Dual-Band Wi-Fi 2x2 USB Module |caption2 = |pp = https://www.unex.com.tw/products/wi-fi/interfaces/usb-wifi/80211ac/detail/dauk-w8812 |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Unex |model = DAUK-W8812 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 13, 2016â€Ž |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Unex_DAUK-W8812 |sernum = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = 6-pin header (non-standard connector) |formfactor = module |vendor_id = 0bda |device_id = 881a |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NKRDAUK-W8812 |icid = 4441A-DAUKW8812 |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = BC:30:7D |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AU;RTL8812AU-VS; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam = |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = DAUK-W8812 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/05/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The particular RTL8812AU variant used is RTL8812AU-VS. '''NCC ID:''' CCAF16LP1460T0 ===Unex's marketing text=== Features 802.11ac dual-band in flexible 6-pin USB 2.0 headers at low power consumption, DAUK-W8812 delivers up to 867Mbps data rate and easily bring quality-consistent Wi-Fi to embedded system. ===Silkscreened text=== * "48DAUK02.SGA" and "2013/10/21" is silkscreened on the board pictured in '''Unex''''s photos. * "48DAUK02.0GA" and "2014/06/05" is silkscreened on the board pictured in the FCC photos. ===Header pinout=== 
1 (WIFI_RESET)
2 (5V)
3 (Data +)
4 (Data -)
5 (GND)
6 (WIFI_WAKE)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
